channel.title: Changing Item Names
channel.description: Basically ive tried changing an item name in items.cfg then compiling but theres no change. How do you change the name of items? for example turn fishing potion into Overload?

item.title: Changing Item Names
item.dc:creator: @bird1 bird_
item.description:
@bird1 wrote:

Care to share?

I suck at models.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Item Names
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“bird_, post:8, topic:378987”]This is what I do:
Get the item of your choice and find the Drop ID (not item ID). Use datEditor is export it as an MQO file. Open the file in meta. Change the colours or what-ever. Then make it into a dat again, and hardcode the item into Class8 or ItemDef.

This way you can change the potion into the right colour, too.[/quote]

There is a MUCH easier way to recolour items.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Item Names
item.dc:creator: @bird1 bird_
item.description:
@bird1 wrote:

This is what I do:
Get the item of your choice and find the Drop ID (not item ID). Use datEditor is export it as an MQO file. Open the file in meta. Change the colours or what-ever. Then make it into a dat again, and hardcode the item into Class8 or ItemDef.

This way you can change the potion into the right colour, too.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Item Names
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

lol @ post above mine @op its client sided itemdef.java or itemdef_2.java is where i put my hardcoded items

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Item Names
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“why so serious, post:2, topic:378987”]Go to:
Config>Items>
ctrl +f

search for the item name

ex: FireCape

Find the code:

item = 6570	Fire_Cape	A_cape_of_fire.	1	35000	1	1	1	1	1	1	11	11	11	11	11	4	2

Your a retard… You don’t change item names in item.cfg facepalm

nathanrr44:

i dont have a class 8 and its not in itemdef.java. basically i changed the name of fishing potion to overload when i drink it it says you drink an overload. however when u hover over it it says fishingpotion 3 and when u examine it also says that.

rova1:

the hover bit is client sided not server, therefore as echo said look in your client folder to see if you have a file called ItemDef.java or Class8.java and then add it in there - all you need to add is the new name and examine text because all other properties don’t need change

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Item Names
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

If its a hardcoded item, you change the name in ItemDef.java or Class8.java.

Read full topic
